body.name: Basysion 2 in1Gel Cushion Portable Massage Travel Cushion,Foldable Cushion, Soft and Breathable.Suitable for car Office Stadium seat Cushion and Other Seats,Easy Travel Cushion
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, March 5 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SOFT AND BREATHABLE: This collapsible gel cushion consists of several hexagonal air columns, very soft and breathable. The seated gel cushion can reduce sweat on your buttocks and won't be stuffy, so you can sit more comfortably.

REMOVABLE COVER AND PORTABLE: The portable seat cushion is designed with handles, removable cover, can be washed in the washing machine, and also can be folded and space-saving. Very CompactYou can take it to the stadium, office, Gaming chair,other rooms, airplanes, cars, subways, trains, buses and other places.excellent for promoting good posture (14.6" x 10.7" x1.18")

Seat cushion is made of ultra-soft, ultra-strong, solid rubber-like Gel and Memory foam material The gel seat cushion features a non-slip bottom design, and the non-slip friction bead grip bottom surface ensures that it stays in place preventing the seat from shifting.

Gel seat cushions can be given to family and friends who are often sedentary to provide you with the comfort you need. The pressure-reducing cushion disperses pressure on the buttocks and eliminates pressure on uncomfortable pressure points, helping to prevent, and reduce pressure pain in the tailbone.
Gel seat cushions are ideal for any office, home or desk chair, and perfect for any garden, outdoor or garden chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps A lot for Uncomfortable Seats
reviews.reviewText: I participate in a few conventions yearly that require stadium chair seating for a few hours. The first day may be tolerable, but the next days are soooo hard to get comfortable! This seat cushion is the perfect solution. I love the fact that it's foldable and light so it's easy to carry. I appreciate the handles, they've come in pretty handy.So I've tried this little thing a few times now and low and behold~ I don't get back pain when I use it! The gel cushion is very comfortable! The black side has a non-slip friction that prevents the seat from shifting which honestly is so needed when sitting.Overall this seat cushion is very practical. I love using it and I can tell it will last quite some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to transport
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I felt that this seat cushion was simply too small when using it on our 16x16 dining chairs or in the car; however, upon positioning it just right in both seating situations, it was very "cushy" (and cooling)-- and impressively, does not slip! Its handles, ability to be conveniently folded, and its compact size make for easy transport; in addition, its cover is removable and washable. I see using this compact cushion in a variety of situations both indoors and outdoors (e.g. benches, stadiums, dining chairs, cars, picnics, sitting on the floor/ground, and more)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but useful gel cushion for beside the bathtub to bathe dogs, babies, if u have bad knees. A+
reviews.reviewText: I know. It's advertised as being a cushion for sitting, but I saw this and said, it would be the perfect size for 2 knees to be perched next to a tub! And it is! I put the non-skid side down, and can kneel comfortably while bathing the dog. Which is great, because I have to wait 10 minutes with flea soap on him to get it to work properly. Yes, it does fold up and have carrying handles, so I could take it if we go on a trip as well. Is perfect for me, and would be perfect for mom's/grandma's etc. who have to kneel next to the tub to bath children, but have a hard time with their aching knees. Much better than being on the tile floor! The gel is very thick and accommodates for the knees perfectly. Might even (with its carrying handles!) work if I wanted to take it to church and kneel there! They have kneelers, but they are no way as comfortable as this gel. I'm very happy I ordered it, and even if I just use it once a month to give the dog a bath, it's well worth it to save my arthritic knees from further pain and injury. A+ awesome from this gal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but small
reviews.reviewText: This would probably be five stars if it were a few inches larger in both dimensions - it honestly seems like it was designed for children more than adults. That said, it's of decent quality and well-made, folds for easy transportation, and offers a good amount of cushion within its size limitation. It does, as another mentioned, offer good utility as a knee pad and potentially in other uses, but it just isn't quite large enough to offer enough comfort when sat on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes sitting on hard surfaces comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I got this gel cushion to take to sporting events and other outdoor activities where I would need to be seated on the ground or other hard surfaces like a bench or bleacher seats. The cushion folds out to a decent size for one person. One cushion could also work for two children to share if need be. The gel is noticeably soft to sit on. It is very comfortable. I appreciate that the cushion folds up smaller (in half) for traveling. The handles attached to it are also helpful for grab and go situations and easy to pick up off the ground. The cushion feels sturdy and strong and I hope will last for a good amount of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Air this Out Immediately but it Works
reviews.reviewText: This foldable gel cushion, designed for both comfort and portability, is an excellent companion for a variety of settings, including plane flights and sports events. Its has a unique structure ensures that helps keep the softness and breathability. I am looking for something to reduce sweat and discomfort during my daily prolonged sitting, but more so the portability.The cushion comes with a removable cover, helping to keep it clean. Its compact design, with a handle means it will be easy to transport and then storage. The non-slip bottom design adds when on more slick surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a portable cushion for uncomfortable chairs at the convenience store where I have coffee with friends. This fits the bill. It’s just the right size for the chair and has adequate cushioning. I also found other uses for it such as athletic events where bleachers and stadiums are uncomfortable and sometimes cold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and convenient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This small little pad is incredibly comfortable. It’s convenient enough to travel with. I’m excited to use it on my cross country flight this week!
